## Tender Announcement

[Government contract]

**Open Construction Tender for 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn**

**Reference Number**: MX-22640271621

**Bid Submission Deadline**: March 31, 2024, at 17:00 hours (local time)

### Authority

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites contractors and suppliers to apply for inclusion in the Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for various construction projects at 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn. Interested contractors and suppliers must submit their application through the MERX online platform.

### Contract Details

The successful contractors will be selected through a competitive bidding process. The contract value is estimated at $10 million and below. The contract will be awarded for a period of three years, from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2026.

### Requirements

Applicants must have the necessary skills, experience, and qualifications to undertake construction projects. They must also comply with the requirements outlined in the Procurement Code of Conduct and the Defence Production Act.

### Security Clearance

Applicants must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and hold a reliable status for personnel. In some cases, Facility Security Clearance (FSC) may be required. Contractors must also adhere to the guidelines outlined in the DCL81-Performance Evaluation Guidelines.

### Application Process

Applicants must submit their application through the MERX online platform, indicating their preferred language (English or French). They must also provide proof of their skills, experience, and qualifications.

### Evaluation Criteria

The applications will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Eligibility
*   Compliance with the Procurement Code of Conduct and the Defence Production Act
*   Qualifications and experience
*   Security clearance
*   Pricing and bid submission

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the MERX online platform. Contractors and suppliers can access the documents and submit their application.

### Contact Information

For further information or to apply for the Open Construction Source List, please contact:

Justin Bennett
Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
Phone: 819-962-2917
MERX: http://www.merx.com

[Fees may apply]
